thread.title: Oystein Hauan
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Oystein Hauan

author: Oystein Hauan
title: Oystein Hauan
text: I ordered a pair of Oliver Peoples glasses, and they were not in stock. They arrived ten days later however, so I was very pleased. I was shocked because in a store in Munich they wanted 550 euros for the frames plus lenses, but on otticanet I got the EXACT same glasses for 215 euros. I am simply perplexed. Excellent customer service as well.
